Soulbringer

The Soulbringer (BlackSkullOfMastery) is an ancient artifact dropped by the Lich boss specifically for players of the Necromancer class. It serves as both an artifact and a path to mastery for Necromancers.

Description

It's an ancient artifact, crafted by first necromancers to collect souls of the fallen one's. Sensing your necromantic abilities it warded itself with a powerful spell. But since the spell is that of the old times, it's primitive structure is fairly easy to break.

Mechanics

When used, the Soulbringer offers the choice between:

  • Breaking the spell (remaining as a Necromancer)
  • Manipulating the spell's magical formula to turn yourself into a Lich (the Necromancer mastery path)

If choosing to become a Lich:

  • The character receives -2 strength penalty
  • The character's skill points are doubled (maxSkillPoints * 2)
  • The character gains necromancy-focused abilities

Acquisition

  • Dropped only by the Lich boss
  • Only drops for players using the Necromancer hero class
  • Other classes receive the standard Black Skull instead

Code Reference

The Soulbringer mechanics are implemented in BlackSkullOfMastery.java, which extends the MasteryItem.java class.
